name: Super Snake (itch)
description:
Super Snake  is classic game like 90's Snake game with new style.

Very easy to play ! just swipe the screen to controll the snake and get score as high as possible.

Game Features:
- Nice smooth swipe control snake movement
- Eat food to get score and be super !
- Random powerup with unique skill"

This is my first project, I know I'am still noob.. :D so I really appreciated any feedbacks and comments. 

Thank you !
